short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your friends and spark up the party with this funny & spicy game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ready to spice up your day? Introducing Truth or Dare, the coolest Chrome extension ever.

This is not just a game, it's a party starter, an icebreaker, and a boredom buster right in your browser! 

Choose from four fabulous categories and dive into a pool of more than 100 thrilling questions and daring challenges. Dare to break the routine and unleash the fun with Truth or Dare.

Add it to Chrome now and let the good times roll!
